original_title: Game Player's Gametape for Nintendo Cartridges - Vol. 1, No. 6: Ultra Games
overview: A video strategy guide tutorial released by Game Player's magazine that covers various Ultra titles including Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, Metal Gear, Skate or Die and Defender of the Crown.
title: Game Player's Gametape for Nintendo Cartridges - Vol. 1, No. 6: Ultra Games
